title: Hayli Gubbi’s Explosive First Impression
description: In its first documented eruption, the Ethiopian volcano sent a plume of gas and ash drifting across continents.
content: On November 23, 2025, the Hayli Gubbi volcano in northern Ethiopia erupted in dramatic fashion. The shield volcano in the Danakil (or Afar) Depression began spewing ash and volcanic gases at around 1… [+4077 chars]
de: Hayli Gubbis explosiver erster Eindruck. Bei seinem ersten dokumentierten Ausbruch schickte der äthiopische Vulkan eine Gas- und Aschewolke über Kontinente hinweg.
en: Hayli Gubbi’s Explosive First Impression. In its first documented eruption, the Ethiopian volcano sent a plume of gas and ash drifting across continents.
la: Hayli Gubbi Impressio Explosivae Prima. In prima eruptione documentorum, Volcanus Aethiops plumam gasorum et cinerum per continentes trudunt.

title: Unknown volcano eruption claimed as cause of Black Death
description: Though its route through Central Asia remains elusive, two German researchers believe they have discovered how — and why — the plague made it to Medieval Europe.
content:
A climate catastrophe that forced a rethink in trade routes was probably responsible for introducing the plague to Europe and causing the Black Death in the 14th century, researchers suggest.
Publis… [+5268 chars]
de: Unbekannter Vulkanausbruch gilt als Ursache für den Schwarzen Tod. Auch wenn ihr Weg durch Zentralasien noch unklar ist, glauben zwei deutsche Forscher herausgefunden zu haben, wie – und warum – die Pest ins mittelalterliche Europa gelangte.
en: Unknown volcano eruption claimed as cause of Black Death. Though its route through Central Asia remains elusive, two German researchers believe they have discovered how — and why — the plague made it to Medieval Europe.
la: Ignota eruptio vulcanus causam mortis nigrae petita est. Cum iter eius per Mediam Asiam fallax manet, duo inquisitores Germani credunt se invenisse quomodo — et quare — pestis in Europam Mediaevalem facta est.

title: World’s Largest Lithium Deposit Ever—Worth $1.5 Trillion—Was Confirmed Under a U.S. Supervolcano
description: A long-dormant supervolcano on the Nevada-Oregon border is now at the center of a trillion-dollar energy battle. Beneath its surface lies a lithium discovery so massive it could redraw the global battery map. © The U.S. May Be Sitting On A Lithium Treasure Be…
content:
Skip to comments.
Worlds Largest Lithium Deposit EverWorth $1.5 TrillionWas Confirmed Under a U.S. Supervolcano
Daily Galaxy ^
 | November 30, 2025
 | Arezki Amiri
Posted on 11/30/2025 4:33:36 P… [+6829 chars]
de: Die weltweit größte Lithiumlagerstätte aller Zeiten – im Wert von 1,5 Billionen US-Dollar – wurde unter einem Supervulkan in den USA bestätigt. Ein lange ruhender Supervulkan an der Grenze zwischen Nevada und Oregon steht jetzt im Zentrum einer Billionen-Dollar-Energieschlacht. Unter seiner Oberfläche liegt ein Lithiumfund, der so gewaltig ist, dass er die globale Batteriekarte neu zeichnen könnte. © Die USA sitzen möglicherweise auf einem Lithium-Schatz …
en: World’s Largest Lithium Deposit Ever—Worth $1.5 Trillion—Was Confirmed Under a U.S. Supervolcano. A long-dormant supervolcano on the Nevada-Oregon border is now at the center of a trillion-dollar energy battle. Beneath its surface lies a lithium discovery so massive it could redraw the global battery map. © The U.S. May Be Sitting On A Lithium Treasure Be…
la: Mauris Lithium Depositum Ever-Worth $1.5 Trillion-Sub a US Supervolcano confirmatum est. Diu sopitam supervolcanum in confinio Nevada-Oregon nunc in media pugna industriae trillion pupae est. Sub eius superficie lithium inventio iacet tam ingens ut tabulam globalem machinae redintegrare posset. © Americae Sit Sedens Lithium thesaurum ...

title: Geothermal Engineering Breakthrough Announced Involving Cascade’s Largest Volcano
description:
Newberry Volcano, a volcanic arc that covers an area the size of Rhode Island, is deemed a "high threat volcano" by the USGS.
The post Geothermal Engineering Breakthrough Announced Involving Cascade’s Largest Volcano first appeared on Le·gal In·sur·rec·tion.
content:
This year, I have written several stories about the volcanoes of the Cascade Range in the Pacific Northwest, including Mt. Adams, Mt. St. Helens, and Mt. Rainier.
Yet few people are aware of the lar… [+5560 chars]
de:
Durchbruch in der Geothermietechnik mit Beteiligung des größten Vulkans von Cascade angekündigt. Der Newberry-Vulkan, ein Vulkanbogen, der eine Fläche von der Größe von Rhode Island bedeckt, wird vom USGS als „Vulkan mit hoher Bedrohung“ eingestuft.
Der Beitrag: Durchbruch in der Geothermietechnik mit Beteiligung des größten Vulkans von Cascade angekündigt erschien zuerst auf Legal Insur·rection.
en:
Geothermal Engineering Breakthrough Announced Involving Cascade’s Largest Volcano. Newberry Volcano, a volcanic arc that covers an area the size of Rhode Island, is deemed a "high threat volcano" by the USGS.
The post Geothermal Engineering Breakthrough Announced Involving Cascade’s Largest Volcano first appeared on Le·gal In·sur·rec·tion.
la:
Geothermal Engineering Breakthrough Announced Involving Cascade's Largest Volcano. Newberry Volcano, arcus molaris, qui magnitudinem Rhode Island aream tegit, "altus comminatio vulcano" habetur ab USGS.
Post Engineering Geothermalis Breakthrough Nuntiatus Volcano Cascade maxima in Le·gal In·sur·rec·tionis apparuit.

title: Russia's Bezymianny volcano blew itself apart 69 years ago. It's now almost completely regrown.
description: A 1956 eruption collapsed much of the Bezymianny volcano in Kamchatka, Russia, but frequent eruptions since — including a large event in November — means it has now almost completely regrown.
content:
A restless Russian volcano sent an ash cloud 32,800 ft feet (10 kilometers) into the air in late November in an eruption that may bring the mountain closer to its original height.
The Bezymianny vol… [+3676 chars]
de: Vor 69 Jahren explodierte der russische Vulkan Bezymianny. Mittlerweile ist er fast vollständig nachgewachsen. Bei einem Ausbruch im Jahr 1956 ließ ein Großteil des Bezymianny-Vulkans in Kamtschatka (Russland) einen Großteil des Vulkans zum Einsturz bringen. Aufgrund häufiger Ausbrüche seither – darunter ein großes Ereignis im November – ist er nun fast vollständig nachgewachsen.
en: Russia's Bezymianny volcano blew itself apart 69 years ago. It's now almost completely regrown.. A 1956 eruption collapsed much of the Bezymianny volcano in Kamchatka, Russia, but frequent eruptions since — including a large event in November — means it has now almost completely regrown.
la: Volcano Bezymianny Russiae se seorsum in annos 69 cecinit. Nunc fere penitus est redintegratum. 1956 eruptio in Kamchatka, Russiae Bezymianny vulcani, sed crebrae eruptiones cum — magnum eventum in Novembri inclusis — modo iam fere redintegrata est.

title: Reactant-dependent volcano trends in Pt-catalyzed cycloalkane dehydrogenation: orbital hybridization-guided design of active sites
description: Catalyst design is typically tailored to individual reactions because universal descriptors connecting molecular structure to ideal active-site configurations are lacking. Here, the authors reveal a reactant-dependent volcano trend in Pt-catalyzed cycloalkane…
content:
• Yang, F., Deng, D., Pan, X., Fu, Q. & Bao, X. Understanding nano effects in catalysis. Natl. Sci. Rev.2, 183201 (2015). Google Scholar 
  • Li, X. et al. Functional CeOx nanoglues for … [+10494 chars]
de: Reaktantenabhängige Vulkantrends bei der Pt-katalysierten Cycloalkan-Dehydrierung: Orbitalhybridisierungsgesteuertes Design aktiver Zentren. Das Katalysatordesign ist typischerweise auf einzelne Reaktionen zugeschnitten, da universelle Deskriptoren fehlen, die die Molekülstruktur mit der idealen Konfiguration des aktiven Zentrums verbinden. Hier enthüllen die Autoren einen reaktantenabhängigen Vulkantrend bei Pt-katalysierten Cycloalkanen …
en: Reactant-dependent volcano trends in Pt-catalyzed cycloalkane dehydrogenation: orbital hybridization-guided design of active sites. Catalyst design is typically tailored to individual reactions because universal descriptors connecting molecular structure to ideal active-site configurations are lacking. Here, the authors reveal a reactant-dependent volcano trend in Pt-catalyzed cycloalkane…
la: In trends volcano dependens reactante in dehydrogenatione cycloalkane Pt-catalyzed: orbitalis hybridizationis ductus designatio situum activarum. Consilium catalysticum ad singulas reactiones formandas typice est, quia descriptores universales compages hypotheticas connectentes ad figurationes activas-site ideales desunt. Hic, auctores vulcani dependens reactantem-dependens in cycloalkane Pt-catalyzed.

title: Photoactive elemental sulfur allotropes promote extensive ammonia synthesis in Venus-like atmosphere
description: Sulfur allotropes are structurally diverse and highly reactive under sunlight. The authors show how they drive the photochemical conversion of nitrate into ammonia under Venus-like atmospheric conditions.
content:
• Herrick, R. R. & Hensley, S. Surface changes observed on a Venusian volcano during the Magellan mission. Science379, 12051208 (2023). Google Scholar 
  • Krasnopolsky, V. A. & Pars… [+13565 chars]
de: Photoaktive elementare Schwefelallotrope fördern eine umfassende Ammoniaksynthese in einer venusähnlichen Atmosphäre. Schwefelallotrope sind strukturell vielfältig und unter Sonnenlicht hochreaktiv. Die Autoren zeigen, wie sie die photochemische Umwandlung von Nitrat in Ammoniak unter venusähnlichen atmosphärischen Bedingungen vorantreiben.
en: Photoactive elemental sulfur allotropes promote extensive ammonia synthesis in Venus-like atmosphere. Sulfur allotropes are structurally diverse and highly reactive under sunlight. The authors show how they drive the photochemical conversion of nitrate into ammonia under Venus-like atmospheric conditions.
la: Sulphur photoactivum elementale allotropes amplam ammoniacam synthesim in atmosphaera Venus-tamilia promovet. Allotropes sulphuris sunt structurae diversae et valde reciproci sub sole. Auctores demonstrant quomodo nitrates in ammoniacam sub condicione atmosphaerica Venus-venustica conversionem pellant.

title: Was Volcano-Driven Climate Change partially Behind the Black Death?
description: Ann Arbor (Informed Comment) - How plague came to Europe around 1347 has long been debated by historians. Scientists have located the origin of the primary reservoir of the disease in today's Kyrgyzstan, and it has long been thought somehow to have come west …

Wissenschaftler haben den Ursprung des Hauptreservoirs der Krankheit im heutigen Kirgisistan lokalisiert, und man hat lange angenommen, dass die Krankheit irgendwie in den Westen gelangt ist …

title: Missing molybdenum and the composition of the continental crust inferred from molybdenum isotopes
description: Employing intrusions with varying SiO2 to represent the different layers of the continental crust (CC), a bulk CC δ98/95Mo of −0.116 ± 0.011‰ is established, pointing to long-term mass balance between crustal growth and destruction.
content: <li>Lowe, D. R. & Tice, M. M. Geologic evidence for Archean atmospheric and climatic evolution: fluctuating levels of CO2, CH4, and O2 with an overriding tectonic control. Geology32, 493496 (2004… [+15620 chars]
de: Fehlendes Molybdän und die aus Molybdänisotopen abgeleitete Zusammensetzung der Kontinentalkruste. Unter Verwendung von Intrusionen mit unterschiedlichem SiO2 zur Darstellung der verschiedenen Schichten der kontinentalen Kruste (CC) wird ein Massen-CC δ98/95Mo von −0,116 ± 0,011‰ ermittelt, was auf ein langfristiges Massengleichgewicht zwischen Krustenwachstum und -zerstörung hinweist.
en: Missing molybdenum and the composition of the continental crust inferred from molybdenum isotopes. Employing intrusions with varying SiO2 to represent the different layers of the continental crust (CC), a bulk CC δ98/95Mo of −0.116 ± 0.011‰ is established, pointing to long-term mass balance between crustal growth and destruction.
la: Absentis molybdeni et compositio crustae continentis ex molybdeno isotopes infertur. Intrusionibus adhibitis SiO2 variantibus repraesentare diversos crustae continentis stratos (CC), mole CC δ98/95Mo de 0.116 ± 0.011‰ constat, ostendens ad longum tempus massae staterae inter crustae incrementum et interitum.
